channel.title: [317] How Do Change Load Bar To [317]

item.title: [317] How Do Change Load Bar To [317]
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

Description - I’m Here To Show you How to change Your load Bar.

Difficulty - This is just Some Copy And Past, so I’d say 1/10.

File Reqs - Client.java ( Client Side )

Tested Server - I tested this on UniversionPk and it was successful

1, Open Client.Java

Search For If u cannot Find it Just Search For is Loading untill you Find it

        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xffffff, "YOUCLIENT is Loading...", 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2);

Untill You Find

[code=c] aClass15_1109.method237(0);
char c = ‘\u0168’;
char c1 = ‘\310’;
byte byte1 = 20;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xffffff, “YOUCLIENT is loading - please wait…”, 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2);

    int j = c1 / 2 - 18 - byte1;
    Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 152, 304, 34, 0x8c1111, j, true);
    Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 151, 302, 32, 0, j + 1, true);
    Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, c / 2 - 150, 0x8c1111, i * 3, 0);
    Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, (c / 2 - 150) + i * 3, 0, 300 - i * 3, 0);
    aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xffffff, s, 23693, (c1 / 2 + 5) - byte1, c / 2);

    aClass15_1109.method238(171, 23680, super.aGraphics12, 202);

[/code]

Replace All that With

[code=caddcl] aClass15_1109.method237(0);
char c = ‘\u0168’;
char c1 = ‘\310’;
byte byte1 = 20;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xffffff, “YOURCLIENT is Loading…”, 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2);
int j = c1 / 2 - 18 - byte1;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 152, 304/width/, 18/height/, 0xCCCCCC, j, true); //OUTLINE
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 151, 302/width/, 16/height/, 0xA5A5A5, j + 1, true); //INLINE
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(14/height/, j + 2, c / 2 - 150, 0x707070, i * 3, 0); //MAIN BAR
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(14/height/, j + 2, (c / 2 - 150) + i * 3, 0, 300 - i * 3, 0);
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method381(0xffffff, s, 23693, (c1 / 2 - 5) - byte1, c / 2); //TEXT

    aClass15_1109.method238(171, 23680, super.aGraphics12, 202);

[/code]
If theres Any problem please Command Down
